summary: TL* TAKATA RECALL. THE CONTACT OWNS A 2010 TOYOTA 4RUNNER. THE CONTACT RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 16V340000 (AIR BAGS) HOWEVER, THE PARTS TO DO THE REPAIR WERE UNAVAILABLE. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE MANUFACTURER EXCEEDED A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME FOR THE RECALL REPAIR. THE CONTACT CALLED FORD BEND TOYOTA AT 20465 SOUTHWEST FWY, RICHMOND, TX 77469, (281) 341-5900 WHERE IT WAS CONFIRMED THAT NO PARTS WERE AVAILABLE AND STATED THAT PARTS WERE ON BACK ORDER. THE CONTACT THEN STATED THAT SHE HAD AN APPOINTMENT WITH STERLING MCCALL AT 9400 SOUTHWEST FWY, HOUSTON, TX 77074, (713) 270-3900 BUT ONCE SHE ARRIVED, THE DEALER STATED THAT NO PARTS WERE AVAILABLE. THE CONTACT CALLED MIKE CALVERT TOYOTA 2333 S LOOP W, HOUSTON, TX 77054 WHERE AND APPOINTMENT WAS MADE BUT ONCE THE CONTACT ARRIVED THE DEALER STATED THAT THEY WERE MISTAKEN AND THAT NO PARTS WERE AVAILABLE. THE CONTACT THEN CALLED JOE MYERS TOYOTA AT 19010 NORTHWEST FWY, HOUSTON, TX 77065 (281) 973-5306 WHERE IT WAS CONFIRMED THAT NO PARTS WERE AVAILABLE. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT NOTIFIED OF THE ISSUE. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE. PARTS DISTRIBUTION DISCONNECT.
